mdRecord.dcterms:title: Will you come to my mountain home? / as sung by the Orphean Family ; words written by Alfred Wheeler and respectfully inscribed to Miss Anna Louisa Hidden ; the music composed by Francis H. Brown
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Brown, Francis H. (Francis Henry), 1818-1891
Orphean Family.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Title page illustration: couple walking along a shore / Sarony & Major's Lith.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M1 .S445 v.5 no. 13: Library's copy imperfect; lacks title page and 1st page of music.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: M1 .S445 v.5 no.13: Thirteenth title in a bound volume of sheet music from the library of Mrs. Harriet Irvine.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: m1 .S444 v.86 no.12: stamp of G. Willig, Baltimore on cover; twelfth title in a bound volume of sheet music from the library of R. J. Tidball.
